articles.description: It’s possible that life on Earth may have started here repeatedly and around the same time at different spots on the globe, says one prominent astrobiologist.
articles.content:
Sun Comes Up from Behind Earth in Space.
getty
The mainstream planetary science community has become so obsessed with the hunt for life offworld, that it often forgets how little we know about how … [+5246 chars]
